pill_knowledge_test.title: Pill Knowledge Test
pill_knowledge_test.subtitle: Test your knowledge with our quiz
pill_knowledge_test.correct_answer: The correct answer is 3 to 6 months.
pill_knowledge_test.additional_info: The effects of the pill are not 'daily' but 'per cycle'.
pill_knowledge_test.more_info: While there is no immediate effect, the pill works by regulating hormonal fluctuations.
